tls:text.tls:line: and ceded to Jì, Xiè, and Gāo Yáo.
Gāo Yáo, the Mán and Yǐ barbarians disturb the Xià, (sc. the chinese)
(But there is) Gao-Yao with vigorous activity sowing abroad his virtue,
'Gao-Yao,
Gao-Yao replied,
Examining into antiquity (we find that ) Gāo Yáo said:
Gāo Yáo said:
Gāo Yáo said:
Gāo Yáo said:
GāoYáo said:
Gāo Yáo said:
Gāo Yáo said:
Gao Yao said:
GāoYáo everywhere reverently carries out your arrangements
GāoYáo everywhere reverently carries out your arrangements
GāoYáo saluted, he bowed down the head,
GāoYáo saluted, he bowed down the head,
and according to the constant and old (affairs=) procedures he determined the laws and regulations.
and according to the constant and old (affairs=) procedures he determined the laws and regulations.
And thrown into confusion his rules and laws;
He made an altar on the southern side, facing north.

sense.def: face in the direction indicated by V
join hands with, unite forces with

tls:text.tls:line: Do not fail to observe the laws and ordinances.
He was (entered into=) appointed to the (hundred disposals=) general management,
the (hundred disposals=) general management was orderly.
I shall make him occupy (the hundred disposals=)the general management,
At court, there were the General Regulator and (the President of) the Four Mountains;
'I have heard that in old time
that anciently Yīn`s former wise kings
Prince Shì! Formerly
Prince Shì! i have heard that anciently,
Formerly Wen and Wu were endowed with all intelligence, august and sage,

tls:text.tls:line: Such is the (virtue=) conduct of (the king of) Xià.
what the oracles (displayed=) indicated was like this.
Fēng! I do not simply like this make a long announcement.
From of old the king has done like this,
Yes, beeing an inspector like this I say:
and sent down destruction as great as this.
(It is only like this=) that is all.
I very sincerely speak like this.

tls:text.tls:line: (Sì)Yuè said: I have not the virtue, I should disgrace the emperor’s high position.

sense.def: archaic, SHI, SHU: humiliate publicly, reduce to public shame, dishonour; disgrace

tls:text.tls:line: (Sì)Yuè said: I have not the virtue, I should disgrace the emperor’s high position.
(Sì)Yuè said: I have not the virtue, I should disgrace the emperor’s high position.

sense.def: (abstract, not narrowly bureaucratic:) (social) position, or seat in the hierarchy (high or low)

tls:text.tls:line: Wildness- constant rain responds to it;
the foolish, if he can think, will become wise.

sense.def: crazy person, madman; eccentric; the eccentric

tls:text.tls:line: the foolish, if he can think, will become wise.

sense.def: archaic: be capable of V-ing; be able to overcome the task of V-ing, have the stamina and power to; manage the difficult task of V-ing

tls:text.tls:line: the foolish, if he can think, will become wise.
the foolish, if he can think, will become wise.

tls:text.tls:line: the foolish, if he can think, will become wise.
In learning

sense.def: the act of trying to learn things

tls:text.tls:line: but to learn the lessons of the ancients is the way to attain this.

sense.def: engage in study regarding, aim to learn about

tls:text.tls:line: but to learn the lessons of the ancients is the way to attain this.
Study antiquity as a preparation for entering on your offices.
Without study, you stand facing a wall,

sense.def: devote oneself to study; be devoted to study; engage in intellectual work; work to improve oneself morally/intellectually

tls:text.tls:line: 'Heaven and earth is the parent of all creatures;

sense.def: the deities of Heaven and Earth

tls:text.tls:line: 'Heaven and earth is the parent of all creatures;

tls:text.tls:line: and, making clear announcement to the Spiritual Sovereign in the high heavens,
falsely and calumniously alleging the sanction of supreme Heaven,
does not reverence Heaven above,

does not reverence Heaven above,
It sent down calamities on (the House of) Xia,

tls:text.tls:line: Great Heaven regarded you with its favour,
and great Heaven sent down calamities,
Great Heaven has graciously favoured the House of Shang,
Great Heaven no (longer) extended its protection to him.
so that he became equal to great Heaven.

Oh, august Heaven, God on High,
Great Heaven has no partial affections;
The august Heaven altered the mandate of the great state Yīn.
If the ruler knows men, he is wise,

tls:text.tls:line: (We have said:) "We come to you, great tortoise",but it (sc. the oracle) has not dared to foresee any luck.
do you still not understand that Heaven`s mandate is not easy (to keep)?
The first is water;
Ordinary men, while they have not yet seen a sage,
These are the three Gong.

tls:text.tls:line: Do not think that he is not to be feared;
early and late never be but earnest.
may you not perchance ( be on your guard=) be mistrustful and lacking in zeal.
When there are men who have ability and activity,
